title: Updated Unicode 7.0 uranges.dat file for FontLab
content:
Updated uranges.dat file for FontLab.

All Unicode 7.0 Character Ranges, plus Control Codes, ASCII and Latin-1, with the ranges sorted in alphabetical order for ease of use.  
Rename from uranges.txt to uranges.dat and place in  
~Library/Application Support/FontLab/Data/  
(OS X)  
This location can also be defined in the FontLab preferences window.  
See documentation for Windows location of this file.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [uranges.txt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322052142/http:/typophile.com/files/uranges_0.txt) | 8.5 KB |
author: Slavenskoj

comments.content:
Additional character ranges in the pipeline for future inclusion in Unicode BMP, and tentative range assignments in the other planes, from the [Unicode Roadmaps](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322052142/http:/www.unicode.org/roadmaps/).  
Roadmap to the BMP (Plane 0)  
Roadmap to the SMP (Plane 1)  
Roadmap to the SIP (Plane 2)  
Roadmap to the TIP (Plane 3)  
Roadmap to the SSP (Plane 14)

`
0X1C80,0x1c88, BMP Cyrillic Extensions C
0x16FA0,0x16FF5, BMP Cherokee Supplement
0x00010000,0x000100FF, SMP Linear B
0x00010100,0x000101CF, SMP Ancient numeric systems
0x000101D0,0x000107FF, SMP Alphabetic and syllabic LTR scripts and sets of symbols
0x00010800,0x00010FFF, SMP Alphabetic and syllabic RTL scripts
0x00011000,0x00011FFF, SMP Brahmic scripts
0x00012000,0x00012FFF, SMP Cuneiform and other ancient scripts
0x00013000,0x00013FFF, SMP Egyptian hieroglyphs
0x00014000,0x00015FFF, SMP Other large scripts
0x00016000,0x00016FFF, SMP Recently-devised scripts
0x00017000,0x0001B4FF, SMP Large East Asian scripts
0x0001B500,0x0001BBFF, SMP Other large scripts

0x0001C000,0x0001CFFF, SMP Other large scripts

0x0001E000,0x0001E7FF, SMP Alphabetic and syllabic LTR scripts
0x0001E800,0x0001EFFF, SMP RTL scripts
0x0001F000,0x0001F0DF, SMP Game symbols
0x0001F0E0,0x0001F2FF, SMP Alphanumeric and ideographic sets
0x0001F300,0x0001F7FF, SMP Pictographic sets
0x0001F800,0x0001FFFD, SMP unassigned
0x0002000,x0002A6DF, SIP CJK Unified Ideographs Extension B
0x0002A6E,x0002A6FF, SIP unassigned
0x0002A70,x0002B73F, SIP CJK Unified Ideographs Extension C
0x0002B74,x0002B81F, SIP CJK Unified Ideographs Extension D
0x0002B82,x0002CEAF, SIP CJK Unified Ideographs Extension E

0x0002DD9,x0002F7FF, SIP unassigned
0x0002F80,x0002FA1F, SIP CJK Compatibility Ideographs Supplement
0x0002FB2,x0002FFFD, SIP unassigned
0x0003000,x0003291F, TIP Small Seal Script
0x00032A0,x000341FF, TIP Oracle Bone Script
0x0003420,x0003FFFD, TIP unassigned
0x000E000,x000E007F, SSP Tag characters
0x000E008,x000E00FF, SSP unassigned
